description: Located 2.3 mi (3.7 km) from the airport, The Arden Hotel & Leisure Club features a rooftop terrace and puts you just a 5-minute drive from National Exhibition Centre. Guests can take a dip in the indoor pool or grab a bite to eat at Burgundy Restaurant, which serves dinner. A bar/lounge and a health club are other highlights, and rooms offer 24-hour room service and flat-screen TVs.

DESCRIPTION.value: Located 2.3 mi (3.7 km) from the airport, The Arden Hotel & Leisure Club features a rooftop terrace and puts you just a 5-minute drive from National Exhibition Centre. Guests can take a dip in the indoor pool or grab a bite to eat at Burgundy Restaurant, which serves dinner. A bar/lounge and a health club are other highlights, and rooms offer 24-hour room service and flat-screen TVs.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value:
In addition to an indoor pool and a children's pool, The Arden Hotel & Leisure Club provides a health club and a spa tub. The hotel offers a restaurant. A bar/lounge is on site where guests can unwind with a drink. High-speed wireless Internet access is complimentary.

This 3-star property offers access to a business center and meeting rooms. 12 meeting rooms are available. This business-friendly hotel also offers a sauna, a rooftop terrace, and an arcade/game room. Onsite self parking is complimentary.

The Arden Hotel & Leisure Club has designated areas for smoking.

DINING.value:
Buffet breakfasts are available for a surcharge and are served each morning between 6:30 AM and 10 AM.
Burgundy Restaurant - This restaurant serves dinner only. Open daily.
24-hour room service is available.

RECREATION.value:
An indoor pool, a children's pool, and a spa tub are on site. Other recreational amenities include a health club and a sauna.

The recreational activities listed below are available either on site or nearby; fees may apply.

CHECK_IN_POLICY.value:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

The preferred airport for The Arden Hotel & Leisure Club is Birmingham (BHX).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
Location
Situated near the airport, this hotel is 2.7 mi (4.3 km) from National Exhibition Centre and 2.7 mi (4.4 km) from LG Arena. National Motorcycle Museum and Brueton Park are also within 6 mi (10 km).

KNOW_BEFORE_YOU_GO.value:
• A resort fee is included in the total price displayed.
  • The property allows pets in specific rooms only and has other pet restrictions (surcharges apply and can be found in the Fees section). Guests can arrange to bring pets by contacting the property directly, using the contact information on the booking confirmation.

FEES.value:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.


  • Fee for buffet breakfast: GBP 10 per person (approximately)
  • Pet fee: GBP 10.00 per pet, per night
  • Late check-out fee: GBP 15.00 per hour
  • Rollaway bed fee: GBP 10 per night

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.
